entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
